Name: Casual Challenge Players Club- Anime Bilhar game
About the game: Casual Challenge is a classic arcade game for those looking for fun above all. A casual but challenging game, with moderate difficulty. Great option to relax and have fun. - 4 game modes. - 2 modes for a single player. - 2 multiplayer modes. - Play locally with your friends. - Remote play together - Play remotely with your friends. - Steam achievements. - Play main mode and feel like a promising young player on your journey to join the club of the biggest players in your country. This mode has a total of 15 tables divided into 3 levels that will bring you new challenges. The first table of each level follows the traditional pattern where you will have 16 strokes to pocket all the balls. The other tables have a very peculiar challenge, you will have a single shot to pocket all the balls that are in pre-defined positions on each table. But don't worry, just a little concentration and you'll be able to overcome all the challenges. - In versus mode, you can face your friends in local or remote multiplayer matches, where the winner will be the one who pockets 5 balls first. - In black ball mode, you can face your friends in local or remote multiplayer matches, but in this mode it doesn't matter who scores the most points, but who pockets the black ball will be the winner. - In 'like a master' mode, you will have to win the 3 tables with just 16 strokes to pocket all the balls, the remaining strokes will be the ones that will be available at the next table, so every mistake can be fatal! Are you ready to face this challenge?
